# SEQ35 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 35 focuses on build outdoor details

## Category
Construction

## Patterns
apl241, apl242, apl243, apl244, apl245, apl246, apl247, apl248

## Emergent Phenomena

## Overview
This sequence contains 8 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
